comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Émile Adolphe Gustave Verhaeren (* 21. Mai 1855 at Sint-Amands near Antwerp; † 27. November 1916 at Rouen) was a Belgian poet who wrote in the French language, and one of the chief founders of the school of Symbolism. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emile_Verhaeren

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B59:  Thankd for the complete information on Verhaeren.  We'll iniclude some of it in the description next time we update.
